description: Returns information about the status of the DeletionProtection parameter.

nested_items.name: DeletionProtection
nested_items.description: A parameter to configure deletion protection. Deletion protection prevents a user from deleting a configuration profile or an environment if AppConfig has called either GetLatestConfiguration or for the configuration profile or from the environment during the specified interval. The default interval for ProtectionPeriodInMinutes is 60.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: A parameter that indicates if deletion protection is enabled or not.

nested_items.name: ProtectionPeriodInMinutes
nested_items.description: The time interval during which AppConfig monitors for calls to GetLatestConfiguration or for a configuration profile or from an environment. AppConfig returns an error if a user calls or for the designated configuration profile or environment. To bypass the error and delete a configuration profile or an environment, specify BYPASS for the DeletionProtectionCheck parameter for either or .
